entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries or snow squalls. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Flurries or snow squalls ending overnight then partly cloudy. Blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm except locally 10 cm in snow squalls. Wind southwest 60 km/h gusting to 80 except gusting to 100 over exposed areas this evening. Wind becoming northwest 50 gusting to 70 overnight. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow or rain. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning after midnight then changing to rain before morning. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Rainfall amount 2 mm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming south 50 gusting to 70 overnight. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 04 February 2023
